EmailTemplate.name: 202103_Internal-Comms_Supplier-Conference_Zoom.1.Invite - header image
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Today | Honeywell 2021 Virtual Supplier Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Honeywell 2021 Supplier Summit You’re invited to attend the March 15 Virtual Supplier Summit from 11:30 a.m. – 2:00 p.m. (MST). This is your opportunity to learn more from Honeywell Aerospace Executive Leadership about our business forecast and supply base partnership opportunities. The session will also include 2020 supplier awards and recognition and Q&A.
Coming away from the event, you can expect to receive follow-up information from your Commodity Manager that will assist in developing an action plan aligned to topics covered in the meeting.
Please register before Friday, March 12 to reserve your space. You will receive additional details once you are registered. REGISTER TODAY <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_Ns3Cp1n3Ql6VVZv57AU8_A]]>
